mapper.select: select m.*,u.*,u.name userName,u.code userCode from lm_meter m,lm_user u
select count(1) from lm_meter m,lm_user u
mapper.update: update lm_meter m set balance = balance - (select p.minconsumequantity * pd.price1 from lm_price p,lm_pricedetail pd where p.id = m.pricecode and pd.priceid = p.id ) where exists (select 1 from lm_bill b where b.billmonth = #{value} and b.meterid = m.id and b.operName = '定时任务生成无数据账单')

update lm_meter m set m.balance = m.balance - (select b.minconsumamount - ( b.minconsumamount *b.quantity/b.minconsumequantity ) from lm_bill b where b.billmonth = #{value} and b.meterid = m.id ), remark = CONCAT('账户补扣最低消费', #{value} ) where m.opened = 1 and exists (select 1 from lm_bill b where b.meterid = m.id and b.billmonth = #{value} and b.minconsumequantity > b.quantity ) and ( m.remark not like concat('账户补扣最低消费',#{value},'%') or m.remark is null )
mapper.select: select ca.value , ( select ifnull(count(DISTINCT p.meterid),0) from lm_record p where substr(p.curtime,9,2) = ca.value and p.curtime like CONCAT(SUBSTR(CURDATE(),1,7),'%') and p.systemid = #{systemid} ) thisMonthData , ( select ifnull(count(DISTINCT pa.meterid),0) from lm_record pa where substr(pa.curtime,9,2) = ca.value and pa.curtime like CONCAT(SUBSTR(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH),1,7),'%') and pa.systemid = #{systemid} ) lastMonthData from ll_conf_attribute ca where ca.code = 'day_of_month' group by ca.value order by ca.value
